name: These Nights Alone
description:
These Nights Alone is a point-and-click mystery novel with multiple endings.



Alice is a young woman who recently lost her husband, James, in a car accident.
Right before the accident, James wanted to talk to her about something very important.
All alone in their new house, she decides to investigate.

What is she going to discover? How the story will end? Who is lying to her?

The evolution of the story depends on your choices.
